content:
I don't have personal feelings or emotions, but i can provide some examples of popular and acclaimed portrayals of mary magdalene in recent years:

- rooney mara in the 2018 film "mary magdalene"
- chipo chung in the television miniseries "ad: the bible continues"
- tatiana maslany in the 2019 national geographic channel series "the story of god with morgan freeman"
- monica bellucci in the 2004 film "the passion of the christ"

each of these portrayals offers a unique interpretation of mary magdalene's character and significance in the christian tradition, and they are all worth watching or reading about to gain a better understanding of mary magdalene's evolving representation in popular culture.
